title: Russell Westbrook, Kyler Murray, and the NFL draft
itunes:title: Russell Westbrook, Kyler Murray, and the NFL draft
description:
Colin discusses Portland Trail Blazers series win over the Oklahoma City Thunder, how players like Blazers G Damian Lillard are changing the game, what the Thunder should do with G Russell Westbrook, more on where QB Kyler Murray may land in the NFL draft, and the Oakland Raiders possibly leaking stories. Guests include Nick Wright, Ric Bucher, Enes Kanter, and Jim Jackson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
